Title: Relates to family court reviews of administrative driver's license suspensions for failure to pay child support and eligibility for restricted use licenses
Summary: Relates to family court reviews of administrative driver's license suspensions for failure to pay child support and eligibility for restricted use licenses.
LawCode: Amd §454, Fam Ct Act; amd §111-b, Soc Serv L; amd §§510 & 530, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, the social services law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to family court reviews of administrative driver's license suspensions for failure to pay child support and eligibility for restricted use licenses
